Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"",! Write "",! Write "
",! Write ! s docid=%request.Get("docid") s class=%request.Get("class") s property=%request.Get("property") if docid,class'="",property'="" d . s obj=$ZOBJCLASSMETHOD(class,"%OpenId",docid) . d:$ISOBJECT(obj) . . s String=$ZOBJPROPERTY(obj,property) . . f i=1:1:$L(String,$C(13)) d . . . w $P(String,$C(13),i)_"
",! Write !,"
",! Write "

",! Write !,"
Скопировать в буфер
" Write !,!,"
Закрыть
" Write "
",! Write "
",! Write "" Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Система складского учёта</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,"<style>" Write !,"TD{font-family:'Arial';font-size:13pt;}",! Write "SPAN{font-family:'Arial';font-size:13pt;color:#0022aa;cursor:hand}",! Write "</style>" Write !,"<script language=""javascript"">" Write !,!,"function load(){",! Write "if(window.dialogArguments!=""""){",! Write " maintext.value=window.dialogArguments;",! Write "}",! Write !,"}",! Write !,"function wopen(url,params)",! Write "{",! Write " if(typeof(params) == ""undefined""){var params=""""}",! Write " window.showModalDialog(url,params,""center:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:400px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes"")",! Write "}",! Write !,!,"function CopyInClipBoard()",! Write "{",! Write " var TextAreaObj = document.getElementById(""TextAreaText"");",! Write " var TextCellObj = document.getElementById(""TextCell"");",! Write " TextAreaObj.value = TextCellObj.innerText;",! Write " TextAreaObj.style.display=""block"";",! Write " TextAreaObj.focus()",! Write " TextAreaObj.style.display=""none"";",! Write " TextAreaObj.select()",! Write " therange = TextAreaObj.createTextRange()",! Write " therange.execCommand(""Copy"")",! Write " alert(""Данные успешно скопированы"")",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
